sponsor: Human Genome Sciences Inc., a GSK Company
briefTitle: A Study of Belimumab Administered Subcutaneously in Subjects With Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, 52-Week Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Belimumab (HGS1006) Administered Subcutaneously (SC) to Subjects With Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE)

arms.label: Belimumab 200 mg SC plus standard therapy

summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy, safety and tolerability of belimumab administered subcutaneously (SC) to adult subjects with Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Par. Achieving a SLE Responder Index (SRI) Response Rate at Week 52
